item.description:
Venez bavarder avec nous-- avec un petit bout a manger ou a boire si vous voulez bien.

ATTENTION! It's still DOVER, but now it's got SOUL. Please check the address and directions for driving and parking, and see you there!

Let's try this NEW location in Dover -- a couple of blocks south, down the hill from the Cafe, same side of the street. Central Ave is one way here, so if you're coming from the south, you'll have to loop around Dover's downtown "square" (which is actually triangle-shaped!). See the Dover Soul website for more detailed driving directions.

Park on Central Avenue in front of the place, or turn right just after Dover Soul and Little Louie's (restaurant with lime-green front, attached to Dover Soul) onto Orchard Steet and park in a public metered lot.

ATTENTION! Dover Soul is two venues in one. We'll attempt to meet at the back of the coffee house (left side of Dover Soul) but may need to move to the bar (right side). On se verra de toute façon ... ce n'est pas si grand que ça.

For more information, see http://www.doversoul....

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: February French Meetup #2: mercredi reunion
